title: UKG Profile
content:
The employee can update many personal details such as personal email, personal phone, etc… Log into Okta Click the UKG HR Portal tile [Image] In UKG Click “Name, Address, and Telephone” Click the pencil/edit icon [Image][NOTE] For technical problems and errors, please reach out in Slack #digital-workplace[INFO] For non-technical help/questions about your profile, please reach out to HR

Page Labels: virtual_agent
